definition: Lüyuan district of Changchun city 長春市|长春市, Jilin
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: The hotel is conveniently located at the junction of Jingyang Road and West Ring Road right in the center of Luyuan District.
sentences.chinese: 酒店地處於綠園區中心的景陽大路與西環城路交匯處。
